name: Stockton, CA
caption: Professor Wellerstein grew up in Stockton, California, which is the intersection of Grapes of Wrath and Breaking Bad.

name: Berkeley, CA
caption: Professor Wellerstein got very lucky that despite his not-great academic record, he was admitted into UC Berkeley, where he lived for four years and then a little longer as he tried to figure out what to do after college.

name: Cambridge, MA
caption: Professor Wellerstein then went to the Boston area to attend graduate school at Harvard University, which was very fancy. He totally never felt out of place there. He fit in. There are lots of people from Stockton at Harvard. Yeah. Sure.

name: Washington, DC
caption: Professor Wellerstein lived in Washington, DC, for three years as a postdoc. He had three years in which could do whatever he wanted, but he needed a job after that, so he spent a lot of time thinking about how to accomplish the latter. He ended up making the NUKEMAP and that made him famous and then he got a job. True story.

name: Hoboken, NJ
caption: Professor Wellerstein became a professor at the Stevens Institute of Technology, where he works to this day! He's enjoying it and hopefully they'll give him tenure and he'll be un-fireable for the rest of his life.
